categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back actors

nodes.text: Christopher Malcolm (August 19, 1946 - February 15, 2014) was a Scottish actor, director, and producer known for his work in the musical The Rocky Horror Show and the films Highlander and Labyrinth. He played the Rebel pilot Zev Senesca in the 1980 film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
